books.description: Your journey to mastery. Learn how to become a more productive and pragmatic programmer.

books.description: Master the world's most-used programming language with this comprehensive guide.

books.title: Node.js Design Patterns

books.title: Introduction to Algorithms

books.description: The leading textbook on algorithms used in universities worldwide.
